summary: Converted Hjornskar Head-Smasher into Jon Snow (Game of Thrones)
descriptionHtml:
Hi guys,
I\'ve converted Hjornskar Head-Smasher (Captain of the Stormcloaks) into Jon Snow (Game of Thrones).
As always I\'ve done my best to make him more similar as possible.
To find him, just travel to Stormcloaks Whiterin Camp.

If you have advices on how to make this mod better, please give them to me.
Thank you in advance for your help
;-)

INSTALL:
1. put content (meshes folder, CWFieldCOSonsWhiterun.esp) into your data folder.
2. enjoy

REQUIRED:
- Companions Wolf Armor Black Version 3 by Kel (if you want the same armor as the previews, without that Jon wears a vanilla Companion Armor)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6943

MY OTHER Game of Thrones CONVERSIONS:
- Mjoll and Aerin - Daenerys and Viserys Targaryen
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10988
- Ulfric --> Eddard Stark
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10448
- Falk Firebeard --> Littlefinger
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10549
- Elisif the Fair --> Cercei Lannister
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10557

LordMaximStark
author: LordMaximStark
